contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=October 2008}} '''Dolphin Factory - イルカ工房 (Iluca Workshop)''' is a noted [[kigurumi]] costume maker in Japan that only makes costumes based on original characters. This studio is a large supplier of hobbyist kigurumi face [[mask]]s of the [[animegao]] (アニメ顔 - Anime Face) kigurumi style. ==External links== * [http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~kiglumin/index.html Studio Homepage] * [http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~kiglumin/index.html Iluca Workshop] * [http://www.yuriskigurumi.com Yuri's Kigurumi Paradise] Pink & black haired characters. * [http://reika.mooshuu.com/ Reika's Kigurumi Haven] * [http://www.kigurumicafe.com/ Miharu's Kigurumi Café] Mask made by Dolphin, designed by Miharu. * [http://gyotti.ddo.jp/~yuki/ Everyday Life of Kigurumi] [[Category:Costume design]] [[Category:Companies of Japan]] {{Japan-company-stub}}
